concept.title: Items
concept.abstract:
An item is any good or service available for sale. Items can be:
Digital (eBooks, apps)
Donations
Inventory
Subscriptions

conbody.p: Items are also automatically created once any ticket type, schedule item, or sponsor package is created for an event, sharing a 1:1 relationship. Through the Item record, staff users can configure the fields related to the item's tax/vat, attributes, assignment options, price rules, and catalogs.
All items within an Item Class will inherit access permissions when the Enable Access Permissions checkbox is selected on the Item Class record.
